font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 栩栩如生的描绘： a brief, vivid portrayal or depiction
【例】 a literary cameo
【考法 2】 v. 客串： to make a brief but dramatic appearance, as in a film
【例】 She cameoed as Anne Boleyn in A Man for All Seasons.
【记】 camera + o镜头状，相机的镜头是用宝石做的，很贵
